meanings.definition: Rolfing: a form of alternative medicine involving deep tissue manipulation
meanings.sent1: After the rolfer finished the session, I felt more relaxed and flexible.
meanings.sent2: She decided to try Rolfing to help with her chronic back pain.
meanings.sent3: The Rolfing session felt like a deep tissue massage with added benefits.
meanings.sent4: The way the rolfer worked on my muscles during Rolfing was like sculpting clay.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the tension release during the Rolfing session.

meanings.definition: Rolfing: the act of receiving a Rolfing treatment
meanings.sent1: Her friend recommended Rolfing to help with her posture.
meanings.sent2: I scheduled a Rolfing appointment for next week.
meanings.sent3: Experiencing Rolfing for the first time was both relaxing and invigorating.
meanings.sent4: During the Rolfing session, I could feel my body realigning.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of Rolfing became evident after a few sessions.

meanings.definition: Rolfing: to undergo Rolfing therapy for pain relief
meanings.sent1: She decided to start Rolfing to address her chronic pain.
meanings.sent2: He has been rolifing regularly to manage his back pain.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would be rolifing, but it really helps.
meanings.sent4: Rolfing has been a game-changer in my pain management routine.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the tension melting away as I was rolifing.
